```{r}
library(RedditExtractoR)
library(RSelenium)
library(rvest)
library(netstat)
library(tidyverse)
library(XML)
```

```{r}
rs_driver_object <- rsDriver(
  browser = "firefox",
  port = free_port()
)
```


```{r}
remDr <- rs_driver_object$client

remDr$open()
remDr$navigate('https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/aapl/historical')
remDr$findElement(using='xpath', '//button[@aria-label="Click to show data for 6 months"]')$clickElement()

```

```{r}
stocks.df <- remDr$getPageSource()[[1]] %>% 
  read_html() %>%
  html_table() %>% 
  flatten() %>% 
  data.frame()
```
